classes.title: Learn to Knit - Dishcloth
classes.description: 4.5mm needles and 1 ball of cotton
classes.note: All yarn to be purchased in store

classes.description: 3.5mm & 3.75 needles & Berocco Vintage
classes.note: All yarn to be purchased in store

classes.title: Learn to Crochet Granny Squares
classes.description: 5 mm hook and 1 ball of cotton
classes.note: All yarn to be purchased in store

classes.title: Learn Basic Socks
classes.description: 3mm needles and 2 balls of DK Sock Yarn
classes.note: All yarn to be purchased in store

classes.title: Learn to Thrum
classes.description: 4mm needles Berocco Vintage & rovings
classes.note: All yarn to be purchased in store

classes.title: Learn Mitred Square dishcloth
classes.description: 4.5mm needles & 1 ball of cotton
classes.note: All yarn to be purchased in store

classes.title: Learn Short Row Techniques
classes.description: 4mm needles and any dk yarn
classes.note: All yarn to be purchased in store

classes.title: Mitred Square Scarf
classes.description: 5mm needles & 1 skein Misti Alpaca Sox
classes.note: All yarn to be purchased in store

classes.title: Learn Magic Loop & Cast on
classes.description: 2.5mm or 2.75mm needle & sock yarn
classes.note: All yarn to be purchased in store

classes.title: Fern Lace Dishcloth beginner lace
classes.description: 4.5mm needles & 1 ball of cotton
classes.note: All yarn to be purchased in store

classes.title: Technique Class: Increases and Decreases
classes.description: 4mm needles and any dk yarn
classes.note: All yarn to be purchased in store
classes.prerequisites: Must know how to knit and purl.

classes.title: Technique Class: Sock Heel - 2 at a time
classes.description: In this 1 hour tech class you will learn how to do the heels that are often worked when making socks in a two at a time pattern, using DK weight yarn and 3.25mm X 80cm circular needles. You will need to cast on 48 stitches, join to work in the round, and knit approximately 1 inch, and bring this to class.  *You must already know how to knit in a Magic Loop.*

classes.title: Technique Class: Sranded knitting - 2 hands
classes.description: In this 1 hour class you will learn how to knit with 2 colours, holding one in each hand.  This will make your stranded knitting go much faster, and produces a smooth, even colourwork project.  This class will use 1 ball each of 2 colours of Debbie Bliss Baby Cashmerino, and a 3.5mm X 40cm circular needle.  *You must already know how to knit in the round.*
classes.prerequisites: Must know how to knit and purl.

classes.title: Knit-A-Long Class: Hidden Gem Scarf
classes.description: An enjoyable lace knit with an easy pattern creating a soft and lightweight scarf in CEY's Fresco.
classes.prerequisites: Should understand lace knitting basics, including chart reading.

classes.title: Knit-A-Long Class: Ginseng Cowl
classes.description: We will be using CEY Vail in gorgeous natural colours to create this lacy, lightweight cowl, and features wave lace sampler motifs and a functional taper to help keep you warm.

classes.title: Knit-A-Long Class: Inez Tank
classes.description: Creating a summer tank using Juniper Moon's Zooey. Starting at the bottom with a lovely lace edge, enjoy the blend of cotton and linen.

classes.title: Technique Class: Magic Loop
classes.description: This class is set to learn the Magic Loop, which can be used to create circular objects, such as socks or sleeves, by the use of a long circular needle.  Anyone who is interested in learning Two at a Time Toe Up Socks MUST know this technique.

classes.title: Project Class: Beginner Lace - Firelight Shawl
classes.description: Knitting this smaller shawl in chunky weight yarn makes for a faster project. Lace is worked along the edging with a garter stitch body. A nice introduction to lace knitting.

classes.title: Project Class: Two at aTime Toe Up Socks
classes.description: A unique method to create two socks at the same time. Working from the toe, you will learn a special cast-on, gusset method and heel, to complete your pair.

classes.title: Crochet-Level 2  Granny Square
classes.description: Using a medium weight yarn, you will learn to crochet the iconic Granny Square. A basic building block of many afghans, baby blankets and patterns.

classes.title: Technique Class: Sewing Up
classes.description: If you have difficulty assembling garments once your knitting is completed then this is the class for you. You will learn how to create proper seams to make your garments look more professionally finished.
classes.prerequisites: In a medium weight yarn, knit 2 swatches that are 15sts x 20 rows in stocking stitch and another 2 swatches 15sts x 30 rows in garter stitch.

classes.title: Learn to Knit
classes.description: If you have always wanted to try knitting but didn't know where to start, this class will help you to create your first dishcloth.

classes.title: Knit-A-Long Class: Notched Hem Tank
classes.description: Here is a wonderful opportunity to try knitting with pure linen/flax. The Notched Hem Tank is a complimentary design featuring longer front and back, with what appear to be inset side panels.
classes.prerequisites: Knit both bottom tabs in preparation for joining in the round.

classes.title: Project Class:  Crocheted Socks - Parker Cable Socks
classes.description: For those of you who love to crochet and have always wanted to try socks. An interesting pattern with a professional looking result.

classes.title: Knit-A-Long: Lorinda Cardi
classes.description: A wonderful summer project to start, in gorgeous Ultra Pima Cotton.  Simple lace accents at bottom edge, sleeves and yoke.

classes.title: Intermediate Lace: Branching Out Shawl
classes.description: Using an easy to follow lace pattern with clear charts, you will create a lovely lace scarf out of a mid-weight cotton.

classes.title: Advanced Lace: Pierpoint Shawl
classes.description: In this class you will create a generous sized shawl (64"x28") with a beautiful leaf motif in the body.  The edge has a slight zigzag detail. The yarn is a lovely mix of wool and silk, creating a light and drapey fabric.

classes.title: My First Shawl: Painted Desert Shawl
classes.description: If you have been intimidated by shawl knitting, then this is the class for you. Learn how to enjoy lightweight yarn, examine the structure of shawl knitting and how to finish properly.

classes.title: Learn to Crochet
classes.description: A class for those new to crochet, where you will use a medium weight yarn and hook to create a dishcloth.

classes.title: Technique Class: Duplicate Stitch
classes.description: Duplicate stitch is used to embellish knitting, in place of stranded knitting, and is the technique by which you repair knitting.
